name: astero1k-es6
description:
A quick proof-of-concept at adapting ASTERO1K into ES6. Your engine is your weapon, shoot & move carefully among blobs!

Controls
  • Left & right keys to rotate the ship
  • Space to activate engine, ie shoot & move at once
  • Press Enter as an option to show some stats: Delay is how many 1/60th seconds has passed since last frame. If it shows 2, that means the game plays at 30 fps. As part of the POC, only the foes keep their speed no matter how slow the game goes, while the player gets slower when that number goes up.
